content: **low vision accessible pattern available** **accessibility statement ** this pattern has a print disability and screen reader friendly version that version has 23pt arial font no italics are used with written instructions the pattern contains images all of which have alt text and captions abbreviations and symbols have been removed from the pattern the pattern has been reviewed using the word read aloud function in adobe acrobat **introduction** with the classic circle scrubby you can create beautiful functional household items or thoughtful gifts with this versatile knit pattern perfect for quick projects this scrubby can be completed in under an hour worked flat the pattern begins with a provisional cast-on followed by a series of short row and finishes with kitchener stitch for a seamless look whether you re knitting for personal use or to sell this pattern is a joy to create if using this pattern for sales please credit me as the designer happy knitting **skills** this project is suited for knitters who are comfortable to work in or who are open to learning the following skills and techniques provisional cast-on wrap and turn knitting short row kitchener stitch garter stitch not familiar with these techniques no problem the pattern includes links to helpful tutorial videos to guide you every step of the way **materials** yarn recommendations loops & threads squeaky clean sparkle fiber content polyester 100% 3 oz/85 g 174 yards/159 meters or any yarn that knits to gauge sample used size s 1/8 oz/4 g 9 yards/8 meters 1 ball in chili colorway size m 1/4 oz/5 g 11 yards/10 meters 1 ball in chili colorway size l 3/8 oz/9 g 24 yards/19 meters 1 ball in chili colorway knitting needles us size 8/5 mm or size used to match gauge -
